name: pouch-browser
description: Look at docs with relationships in pouchdb

scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run server
scripts.demo: browserify example/example.js > example/bundle.js && html-inline example/index.html | curl -sT- https://htmlb.in | pbcopy && echo "Don't forget to paste the demo URL into the readme."

author: Nick Thomas <nichoth@gmail.com>
